mysql.innodb.locks.os_waits.name: mysql.innodb.locks.os_waits
mysql.innodb.locks.os_waits.definition: 线程放弃spin wait尝试，直接进入sleep状态的次数

mysql.innodb.locks.spin_waits.name: mysql.innodb.locks.spin_waits
mysql.innodb.locks.spin_waits.definition: 线程尝试获取spin锁而不可得的次数，也就是 spin-wait 的次数

mysql.max_used_connections.name: mysql.max_used_connections
mysql.max_used_connections.definition: 同时使用的连接的最大数目

mysql.queries.name: mysql.queries
mysql.queries.definition: The number of statements executed by the server. This variable includes statements executed within stored programs, unlike the Questions variable. It does not count COM_PING or COM_STATISTICS commands.

mysql.questions.name: mysql.questions
mysql.questions.definition: The number of statements executed by the server. This includes only statements sent to the server by clients and not statements executed within stored programs, unlike the Queries variable. This variable does not count COM_PING, COM_STATISTICS, COM_STMT_PREPARE, COM_STMT_CLOSE, or COM_STMT_RESET commands.

mysql.slow_queries.name: mysql.slow_queries
mysql.slow_queries.definition: Number of queries that took more than long_query_time seconds to execute. Slow queries generate excessive disk reads, memory and CPU usage. Check slow_query_log to find them

mysql.threads_connected.name: mysql.threads_connected
mysql.threads_connected.definition: Number of clients currently connected. If none or too high, something is wrong

mysql.uptime.name: mysql.uptime
mysql.uptime.definition: Seconds since the server was started. We can use this to detect respawns.

mysql.connection_states.name: mysql.connection_states
mysql.connection_states.definition: The number of connection attempts (successful or not) to the MySQL server

mysql.innodb.history_list_length.name: mysql.innodb.history_list_length
mysql.innodb.history_list_length.definition: 历史记录的长度，即位于innodb数据文件的撤销空间里的页面的数目

mysql.innodb.ibuf.free_list_len.name: mysql.innodb.ibuf.free_list_len
mysql.innodb.ibuf.free_list_len.definition: 表示ibuf树的空闲链表长度

mysql.innodb.ibuf.seg_size.name: mysql.innodb.ibuf.seg_size
mysql.innodb.ibuf.seg_size.definition: 包含ibuf header页和ibuf tree的segment的Page数

mysql.innodb.locks.rounds.name: mysql.innodb.locks.rounds
mysql.innodb.locks.rounds.definition: 线程进入spin wait循环的次数，也就是检查mutex锁的次数

mysql.innodb.queries_queued.name: mysql.innodb.queries_queued
mysql.innodb.queries_queued.definition: 有多少个正在查询操作个数

mysql.last_query_partial_plans.name: mysql.last_query_partial_plans
mysql.last_query_partial_plans.definition: 有多少个正在查询操作个数

mysql.not_flushed_delayed_rows.name: mysql.not_flushed_delayed_rows
mysql.not_flushed_delayed_rows.definition: 在INSERT DELAY队列中等待写入的行的数量

mysql.open_streams.name: mysql.open_streams
mysql.open_streams.definition: 打开流的数量(主要用于日志记载)

mysql.performance_schema_accounts_lost.name: mysql.performance_schema_accounts_lost
mysql.performance_schema_accounts_lost.definition: The number of times a row could not be added to the accounts table because it was full.

mysql.performance_schema_cond_classes_lo.name: mysql.performance_schema_cond_classes_lost
mysql.performance_schema_cond_classes_lo.definition: How many condition instruments could not be loaded

mysql.performance_schema_cond_instances_.name: mysql.performance_schema_cond_instances_lost
mysql.performance_schema_cond_instances_.definition: How many condition instrument instances could not be created

mysql.performance_schema_digest_lost.name: mysql.performance_schema_digest_lost
mysql.performance_schema_digest_lost.definition: The number of digest instances that could not be instrumented in theevents_statements_summary_by_digest table. This can be nonzero if the value ofperformance_schema_digests_size is too small

mysql.performance_schema_file_classes_lo.name: mysql.performance_schema_file_classes_lost
mysql.performance_schema_file_classes_lo.definition: How many file instruments could not be loaded

mysql.performance_schema_file_handles_lo.name: mysql.performance_schema_file_handles_lost
mysql.performance_schema_file_handles_lo.definition: How many file instrument instances could not be opened

mysql.performance_schema_file_instances_.name: mysql.performance_schema_file_instances_lost
mysql.performance_schema_file_instances_.definition: How many file instrument instances could not be created

mysql.performance_schema_hosts_lost.name: mysql.performance_schema_hosts_lost
mysql.performance_schema_hosts_lost.definition: The number of times a row could not be added to the hosts table because it was full

mysql.performance_schema_locker_lost.name: mysql.performance_schema_locker_lost
mysql.performance_schema_locker_lost.definition: How many events are “lost” or not recorded, due to the following conditions: Events are recursive. The depth of the nested events stack is greater than the limit imposed by the implementation. Events recorded by the Performance Schema are not recursive, so this variable should always be 0.

mysql.performance_schema_mutex_classes_l.name: mysql.performance_schema_mutex_classes_lost
mysql.performance_schema_mutex_classes_l.definition: The number of times a memory instrument could not be loaded

mysql.performance_schema_mutex_instances.name: mysql.performance_schema_mutex_instances_lost
mysql.performance_schema_mutex_instances.definition: How many mutex instrument instances could not be created

mysql.performance_schema_rwlock_classes_.name: mysql.performance_schema_rwlock_classes_lost
mysql.performance_schema_rwlock_classes_.definition: How many rwlock instruments could not be loaded

mysql.performance_schema_rwlock_instance.name: mysql.performance_schema_rwlock_instances_lost
mysql.performance_schema_rwlock_instance.definition: How many rwlock instrument instances could not be created

mysql.performance_schema_session_connect.name: mysql.performance_schema_session_connect_attrs_lost
mysql.performance_schema_session_connect.definition: The number of connections for which connection attribute truncation has occurred.

mysql.performance_schema_socket_classes_.name: mysql.performance_schema_socket_classes_lost
mysql.performance_schema_socket_classes_.definition: How many socket instruments could not be loaded

mysql.performance_schema_socket_instance.name: mysql.performance_schema_socket_instances_lost
mysql.performance_schema_socket_instance.definition: How many socket instrument instances could not be created

mysql.performance_schema_stage_classes_l.name: mysql.performance_schema_stage_classes_lost
mysql.performance_schema_stage_classes_l.definition: How many stage instruments could not be loaded

mysql.performance_schema_statement_class.name: mysql.performance_schema_statement_classes_lost
mysql.performance_schema_statement_class.definition: How many statement instruments could not be loaded

mysql.performance_schema_table_handles_l.name: mysql.performance_schema_table_handles_lost
mysql.performance_schema_table_handles_l.definition: How many table instrument instances could not be opened

mysql.performance_schema_table_instances.name: mysql.performance_schema_table_instances_lost
mysql.performance_schema_table_instances.definition: How many table instrument instances could not be created

mysql.performance_schema_thread_classes_.name: mysql.performance_schema_thread_classes_lost
mysql.performance_schema_thread_classes_.definition: How many thread instruments could not be loaded

mysql.performance_schema_thread_instance.name: mysql.performance_schema_thread_instances_lost
mysql.performance_schema_thread_instance.definition: The number of thread instances that could not be instrumented in the threads table

mysql.performance_schema_users_lost.name: mysql.performance_schema_users_lost
mysql.performance_schema_users_lost.definition: The number of times a row could not be added to the users table because it was full

mysql.prepared_stmt_count.name: mysql.prepared_stmt_count
mysql.prepared_stmt_count.definition: The current number of prepared statements.

mysql.qcache_free_blocks.name: mysql.qcache_free_blocks
mysql.qcache_free_blocks.definition: Query Cache 中目前还有多少剩余的blocks。如果该值显示较大，则说明Query Cache 中的内存碎片较多了，可能需要寻找合适的机会进行整理。

mysql.qcache_free_memory.name: mysql.qcache_free_memory
mysql.qcache_free_memory.definition: Query Cache 中目前剩余的内存大小。通过这个参数我们可以较为准确的观察出当前系统中的Query Cache 内存大小是否足够，是需要增加还是过多了；

mysql.qcache_hits.name: mysql.qcache_hits
mysql.qcache_hits.definition: 多少次命中。通过这个参数我们可以查看到Query Cache 的基本效果；

mysql.qcache_inserts.name: mysql.qcache_inserts
mysql.qcache_inserts.definition: 多少次未命中然后插入。通过“Qcache_hits”和“Qcache_inserts”两个参数我们就可以算出Query Cache 的命中率了：

mysql.qcache_lowmem_prunes.name: mysql.qcache_lowmem_prunes
mysql.qcache_lowmem_prunes.definition: 多少条Query 因为内存不足而被清除出Query Cache。通过“Qcache_lowmem_prunes”和“Qcache_free_memory”相互结合，能够更清楚的了解到我们系统中Query Cache 的内存大小是否真的足够，是否非常频繁的出现因为内存不足而有Query 被换出

mysql.qcache_not_cached.name: mysql.qcache_not_cached
mysql.qcache_not_cached.definition: 因为query_cache_type 的设置或者不能被cache 的Query 的数量；

mysql.qcache_queries_in_cache.name: mysql.qcache_queries_in_cache
mysql.qcache_queries_in_cache.definition: 当前Query Cache 中cache 的Query 数量；

mysql.qcache_total_blocks.name: mysql.qcache_total_blocks
mysql.qcache_total_blocks.definition: 当前Query Cache 中的block 数量

mysql.select_full_join.name: mysql.select_full_join
mysql.select_full_join.definition: Number of full joins needed to answer queries. If too high, improve your indexing or database schema

mysql.select_full_range_join.name: mysql.select_full_range_join
mysql.select_full_range_join.definition: The number of joins that used a range search on a reference table

mysql.select_range.name: mysql.select_range
mysql.select_range.definition: The number of joins that used ranges on the first table. This is normally not a critical issue even if the value is quite large

mysql.select_range_check.name: mysql.select_range_check
mysql.select_range_check.definition: The number of joins without keys that check for key usage after each row. If this is not 0, you should carefully check the indexes of your tables

mysql.select_scan.name: mysql.select_scan
mysql.select_scan.definition: The number of joins that did a full scan of the first table

mysql.slave_open_temp_tables.name: mysql.slave_open_temp_tables
mysql.slave_open_temp_tables.definition: The number of temporary tables that the slave SQL thread currently has open.

mysql.slow_launch_threads.name: mysql.slow_launch_threads
mysql.slow_launch_threads.definition: The number of threads that have taken more than slow_launch_time seconds to create
